About Me

If something you thought was true about your money, turned out not to be true, when would you want to find out?

BIO

Rey Galindo was born in Mexico City, Mexico. He has lived in Cleveland, Ohio most of his life. He graduated from The Ohio State University in 1981 in Economics and also studied at the Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México in Mexico City.

Rey began his career in the restaurant business in 1987 as Chef and co-owner of Luchita's Mexican Restaurant which has been in business for over thirty-five years. Rey has been an intricate part of the Hispanic community in the Cleveland area with experience with the Esperanza organization as a board member and a volunteer to help underprivileged students gain grants for higher education.

He retired from the restaurant business in 2013 and started his career in Financial Services in 2014 with Morin-Levine Finacial Services. Rey left Morin-Levine Finacial Services in 2018 to join the Kestler Financial Group to provide you with the best service in Finance and Insurance.

Experince

Rey has been working with individuals and businesses in the Cleveland area for several years. He has extensive personal and professional experience and holds various professional designations, and is licensed to sell a variety of investment and insurance products. Rey is dedication to developing lasting relationships with all his clients are his goal.

Growing

In helping you assess your financial goals and participate in the management of your finances. One of the benefits of working with Rey is my ability to provide clear, easily understood explanations of financial products and services. The personalized program that Rey can provide is a roadmap to working toward a more secure financial future. He is looking forward to using our expertise to help you pursue your financial goals.
